MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW9 postcode area of Wincham and Marston, affecting properties in Chapel Street, Hawthorn Walk and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.52am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the network fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 9am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.01am on 29th of April 2021.
